DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect substrate oxidation , express RER , food intake regulation net energy balance .
DOC.brief_title: Substrate Oxidation Does Not Affect Short Term Food Intake Healthy Boys Men
DOC.detailed_description: The relationship substrate oxidation measure respiratory exchange ratio ( RER ) food intake undefined . This study examine effect three modulators substrate oxidation ( RER ) , glucose preload , exercise age food intake regulation net energy balance normal-weight boy ( 9-12 ) men ( 20-30 ) . Subjects ( 15 boy , 15 men ) measure random order treatment beverages either water glucose follow either moderate exercise rest 40 min . Measures include RER via indirect calorimetry , energy expenditure , subjective appetite , food intake measure ad libitum pizza meal net energy balance sum calorie glucose preload + calorie pizza lunch minus energy expend exercise rest .
